# (PART) Part I: Introduction {-} 

# Introduction

Goal

* Current statistical practice, with an emphasis on modeling
* Data analysis, from t-tests to mixed models in R
* Data visualzation, with an emphasis on ggplot2
* Data science, from data management to data cleaning with dplyr
* Computational reproducibility, from formatting scripts to using rmarkdown

Approach

* always explore and visualize data
* step-by-step intructions
* frequently refreshing and review
* comprehensive and self-contained

Requirements

* R
* RStudio
* External packages loaded via RStudio
